column4: Ok, I'm having this really annoying problem w/ my video display.  I keep seeing green "sparkling" dots in various places, and when I try to run certain graphics intensive programs, the screen just goes black for a couple of seconds.  What could be causing this?
768M system..  how do I find out my video memory?
My video card is:  "nVidia GeForce4 Ti 4200 AGP 8x"
you could #lspci and find it on the net.
if you have 128 than thats your problem
do you have 128 or 768? of system mem?
I was saying my graphics card was 128
then memory doesnt sound to be your problem
does the green stuff happen all the time?
not all the time,  seems to happen after the computer has been on for awhile
